overview: After he and 34 other contract workers are fired for forming a union at a GM/Daewoo auto plant in Korea, Hyunsang Park conducts a one-man sit-in of a traffic control tower, waging a lonely, boring and frustrating campaign to get the jobs reinstated. Meanwhile, other contract workers on the factory floor face discrimination and low pay. The probing documentary -- in the spirit of Roger & Me -- screened at the prestigious Hot Docs film festival.
title: Black Badge
